text: When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. At exactly the 85 year mark after being treated with the drug, the patients would age 85 years in a little less then a week and a large portion of them die before the week is over. By this time period 92% of the world had been given the new immortality drug.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. At exactly the 85 year mark after being treated with the drug, the patients would age 85 years in a little less then a week and a large portion of them die before the week is over. By this time period 92% of the world had been given the new immortality drug. The remaining 8% were the ones who had been deemed too high-risk to receive the drug.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. At exactly the 85 year mark after being treated with the drug, the patients would age 85 years in a little less then a week and a large portion of them die before the week is over. By this time period 92% of the world had been given the new immortality drug. The remaining 8% were the ones who had been deemed too high-risk to receive the drug when it first came out. Fortunately, there were some still alive because they were the key to curing the human race.

Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. At exactly the 85 year mark after being treated with the drug, the patients would age 85 years in a little less then a week and a large portion of them die before the week is over. By this time period 92% of the world had been given the new immortality drug. The remaining 8% were the ones who had been deemed too high-risk to receive the drug when it first came out. Fortunately, there were some still alive because they were the key to curing the human race. 
A scientist at the CDC first learns that there is a natural immune response that the lost generations have that the immortals did not.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. At exactly the 85 year mark after being treated with the drug, the patients would age 85 years in a little less then a week and a large portion of them die before the week is over. By this time period 92% of the world had been given the new immortality drug. The remaining 8% were the ones who had been deemed too high-risk to receive the drug when it first came out. Fortunately, there were some still alive because they were the key to curing the human race. 
A scientist at the CDC first learns that there is a natural immune response that the lost generations have that the immortals did not. He then goes on to find a way to replicate the immune response and create a cure.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. At exactly the 85 year mark after being treated with the drug, the patients would age 85 years in a little less then a week and a large portion of them die before the week is over. By this time period 92% of the world had been given the new immortality drug. The remaining 8% were the ones who had been deemed too high-risk to receive the drug when it first came out. Fortunately, there were some still alive because they were the key to curing the human race. 
A scientist at the CDC first learns that there is a natural immune response that the lost generations have that the immortals did not. He then goes on to find a way to replicate the immune response and create a cure. Testing started right away and during this time two shots were mixed up in the lab. One containing the cure and one blood from a cured immortal. The cured immortals blood immediately started to rejuvenate the old man's system and over the course of a week turned back into a 28 year old. It turned out the cure for the immortals was also the cure for the lost generation.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. At exactly the 85 year mark after being treated with the drug, the patients would age 85 years in a little less then a week and a large portion of them die before the week is over. By this time period 92% of the world had been given the new immortality drug. The remaining 8% were the ones who had been deemed too high-risk to receive the drug when it first came out. Fortunately, there were some still alive because they were the key to curing the human race. 
A scientist at the CDC first learns that there is a natural immune response that the lost generations have that the immortals did not. He then goes on to find a way to replicate the immune response and create a cure. Testing started right away and during this time two shots were mixed up in the lab. One containing the cure and one blood from a cured immortal. The cured immortals blood immediately started to rejuvenate the old man's system and over the course of a week turned back into a 28 year old. It turned out the cure for the immortals was also the cure for the lost generation. The CDC started to administer the cure to the lost generation and within a week the lost generation was back to normal.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. At exactly the 85 year mark after being treated with the drug, the patients would age 85 years in a little less then a week and a large portion of them die before the week is over. By this time period 92% of the world had been given the new immortality drug. The remaining 8% were the ones who had been deemed too high-risk to receive the drug when it first came out. Fortunately, there were some still alive because they were the key to curing the human race. 
A scientist at the CDC first learns that there is a natural immune response that the lost generations have that the immortals did not. He then goes on to find a way to replicate the immune response and create a cure. Testing started right away and during this time two shots were mixed up in the lab. One containing the cure and one blood from a cured immortal. The cured immortals blood immediately started to rejuvenate the old man's system and over the course of a week turned back into a 28 year old. It turned out the cure for the immortals was also the cure for the lost generation. The CDC started to administer the cure to the lost generation and within a week the lost generation was back to normal. Within a year the whole world was back to living young, healthy lives again and the horrors of the past year never repeated again.
